Title: Urban Legend
Overview: A college campus is plagued by a vicious serial killer murdering students in ways that correspond to various urban legends.
Tagline: What you don't believe can kill you.
production_companies: Original Film, TriStar Pictures, Phoenix Pictures, Canal+ Droits Audiovisuels
Cast: Alicia Witt, Jared Leto, Rebecca Gayheart
